entry.title: first post
entry.content:
my first post from my first blog

2013 June 16

welcome to … me

it’s never too late

Indeed it’s never too late to start something even it’s the hard way. In fact I’ve just finished to read a book recently about how to better learning and thinking (you know what I mean!) Well, a lot of stuff to be done but somewhere a sort of excitment of a kid in front of a Meccano (for who likes this)

follow the tips

Yes there’s a full of useful tips to follow in this book but to begin I retain only few ones (those which are tools-oriented). First subscribe to on open source project, second read deliberately using mind map and wiki, third make your blog.

time to work

And now with all these pieces of how-to-learn-and-think it’time to start in exploration and come back soon to expose some feeling and feedback
